data.name: ScriptEventDescriptor
desc: describes an effect, especially a script to be executed, for a certain event given by the listener type and the name of the event method.

properties.name: ListenerType
desc: listener type as string, same as listener-XIdlClass.getName().

properties.name: AddListenerParam
desc: data to be used if the addListener method needs an additional parameter.
If the type of this parameter is different from string, it will be converted, when added.

properties.name: ScriptType
desc: type of the script language as string; for example, \"Basic\" or \"StarScript\".

properties.name: ScriptCode
desc: script code as string (the code has to correspond with the language defined by ScriptType).
